rooms.description: Serves as a welcoming entrance area. Incorporates traditional Chettinad arches and ornamental detailing.
Large open living space with integrated natural light via large French doors facing the garden. Incorporates Vastu aligned east-west orientation for prosperity and harmony.
Modern, open-plan kitchen adjoining the living area with south-east facing windows to harness morning sunlight. Incorporates traditional Chettinad tiling and granite countertops.
Spacious dining space seamlessly connected with the living room, featuring high ceilings and natural light from skylights.
Dedicated home office area in a quiet corner of the ground floor, designed with a north-east orientation to boost concentration and productivity.
Functional guest bathroom adjacent to the living area. Features ample ventilation and natural light to promote freshness.

openings.description: Main entrance door with traditional Chettinad wood carvings. Positioned in the north for welcoming positive energy.
Large windows on east and west sides to maximize natural light throughout the day while ensuring privacy with traditional lattice work.
Skylights installed in the dining area ceiling to enhance natural light and improve ventilation, following Vastu guidelines.
